entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
